Transmutation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X random Upgraded Colorless cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

True Grit.NAME: True Grit
True Grit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card at random.

Turbo.NAME: TURBO
Turbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.
Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

Underhanded Strike.NAME: Sneaky Strike
Underhanded Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have discarded a card this turn, NL gain [G] [G].

Undo.NAME: Equilibrium
Undo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand this turn.

Unload.NAME: Unload
Unload.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand.

Uppercut.NAME: Uppercut
Uppercut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Venomology.NAME: Alchemize
Venomology.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

Void.NAME: Void
Void.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy.

Warcry.NAME: Warcry
Warcry.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Warcry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Well Laid Plans.NAME: Well-Laid Plans
Well Laid Plans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card.
Well Laid Plans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

Whirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.

White Noise.NAME: White Noise
White Noise.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Wild Strike.NAME: Wild Strike
Wild Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Wound into your draw pile.

Wraith Form v2.NAME: Wraith Form
Wraith Form v2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

Core Surge.NAME: Core Surge
Core Surge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

Compile Driver.NAME: Compile Driver
Compile Driver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card for each unique Orb you have.

RitualDagger.NAME: Ritual Dagger
RitualDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Pride.NAME: Pride
Pride.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

PanicButton.NAME: Panic Button
PanicButton.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. You cannot gain Block from cards for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

HandOfGreed.NAME: Hand of Greed
HandOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Gold.

Violence.NAME: Violence
Violence.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Impatience.NAME: Impatience
Impatience.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Attacks in your hand, draw !M! cards.

Forethought.NAME: Forethought
Forethought.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
Forethought.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put any number of cards from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile. They cost 0 until played.

Discovery.NAME: Discovery
Discovery.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Discovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

EmptyFist.NAME: Empty Fist
EmptyFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exit your Stance.

EmptyBody.NAME: Empty Body
EmptyBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exit your Stance.

WreathOfFlame.NAME: Wreath of Flame
WreathOfFlame.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

FearNoEvil.NAME: Fear No Evil
FearNoEvil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to Attack, enter Calm.

MentalFortress.NAME: Mental Fortress
MentalFortress.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, gain !M! Block.

Mastery.NAME: Mastery
Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attempt to switch Stances to your current Stance, gain [B].

Collect.NAME: Collect
Collect.DESCRIPTION: Put a *Miracle+ into your hand at the start of your next X turns. NL Exhaust.
Collect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a *Miracle+ into your hand at the start of your next X+1 turns. NL Exhaust.

ForeignInfluence.NAME: Foreign Influence
ForeignInfluence.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Attacks of any color to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
ForeignInfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Attacks of any color to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

FlowState.NAME: DEPRECATED Flow State
FlowState.DESCRIPTION: Wrath: Enter Calm. NL Calm: Enter Wrath. NL Exhaust.
FlowState.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Wrath: Enter Calm. NL Calm: Enter Wrath.

FlurryOfBlows.NAME: Flurry of Blows
FlurryOfBlows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you change Stances, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Wrath.NAME: Wrath
Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal and receive double attack damage.

Polymath.NAME: DEPRECATED Polymath
Polymath.DESCRIPTION: Enter Calm or Wrath. NL Exhaust.

Flicker.NAME: DEPRECATED Flicker
Flicker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills the enemy, return this card to your hand.

Blasphemy.NAME: Blasphemy
Blasphemy.DESCRIPTION: Enter Divinity. NL Die next turn. NL Exhaust.
Blasphemy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Divinity. NL Die next turn. NL Exhaust.

Ragnarok.NAME: Ragnarok
Ragnarok.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

StepAndStrike.NAME: DEPRECATED Step and Strike
StepAndStrike.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less per switched Stance this turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

Swipe.NAME: DEPRECATED Swipe
Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal half this damage to all other enemies.

Blessed.NAME: DEPRECATED Blessed
Blessed.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Miracles into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Blessed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Miracles+ into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

LetFateDecide.NAME: DEPRECATED Let Fate Decide
LetFateDecide.DESCRIPTION: Play the top X cards of your draw pile. If X is 3 or more, Retain X cards.

RetreatingHand.NAME: DEPRECATED Retreating Hand
RetreatingHand.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. If the previous card played was an Attack, return this card to your hand.
RetreatingHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If the previous card played was an Attack, return this card to your hand.

PerfectedForm.NAME: DEPRECATED Perfected Form
PerfectedForm.DESCRIPTION: If you have entered all basic Stances this turn, enter Divinity. NL Exhaust.
PerfectedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have entered all basic Stances this turn, enter Divinity.

EmptyMind.NAME: Empty Mind
EmptyMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exit your Stance.
EmptyMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exit your Stance.

Experienced.NAME: DEPRECATED Experienced
Experienced.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Upgraded card in your hand.

Judgement.NAME: Judgment
Judgement.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set their NL HP to 0.

Pray.NAME: Pray
Pray.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. NL Shuffle an *Insight into your draw pile.

Conclude.NAME: Conclude
Conclude.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL End your turn.

LessonLearned.NAME: Lesson Learned
LessonLearned.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Upgrade a random card in your deck. NL Exhaust.

CutThroughFate.NAME: Cut Through Fate
CutThroughFate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card.

SublimeSlice.NAME: DEPRECATED Sublime Slice
SublimeSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enter a random Stance.

SignatureMove.NAME: Signature Move
SignatureMove.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if this is the only Attack in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

Prediction.NAME: DEPRECATED Prediction
Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block at the start of your next turn.

Fasting2.NAME: Fasting
Fasting2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain 1 less [W] at the start of each turn.

DevaForm.NAME: Deva Form
DevaForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [W] NL and increase this gain by !M!.
DevaForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [W] NL and increase this gain by !M!.

Wireheading.NAME: Foresight
Wireheading.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Scry !M!.

ReachHeaven.NAME: Reach Heaven
ReachHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a NL *Through *Violence into your draw pile.

ThroughViolence.NAME: Through Violence
ThroughViolence.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Clarity.NAME: Clarity
Clarity.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Add 1 to your hand. NL Exhaust the other.
Clarity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Add 1 to your hand. NL Exhaust the rest.

Meditate.NAME: Meditate
Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand and Retain it. NL Enter Calm. NL End your turn.
Meditate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand and Retain them. NL Enter Calm. NL End your turn.

Vault.NAME: Vault
Vault.DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn after this one. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

Flow.NAME: DEPRECATED Flow
Flow.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity. When you play a Skill, gain 1 temporary Strength.

CarveReality.NAME: Carve Reality
CarveReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Smite into your hand.

Smite.NAME: Smite
Smite.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Truth.NAME: Truth
Truth.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
Truth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Insight.NAME: Insight
Insight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

DeceiveReality.NAME: Deceive Reality
DeceiveReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Safety into NL your hand.

Safety.NAME: Safety
Safety.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Peace.NAME: Peace

WindmillStrike.NAME: Windmill Strike
WindmillStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

Establishment.NAME: Establishment
Establishment.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Retained, reduce its cost by !M! this combat.
Establishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is Retained, reduce its cost by !M! this combat.

WardAura.NAME: DEPRECATED Ward Aura
WardAura.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block.

Evaluate.NAME: Evaluate
Evaluate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle an *Insight into your draw pile.
Evaluate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle an *Insight+ into your draw pile.

Devotion.NAME: Devotion
Devotion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Mantra.

SoothingAura.NAME: DEPRECATED Soothing Aura
SoothingAura.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 Weak to a random enemy.

FuryAura.NAME: DEPRECATED Fury Aura
FuryAura.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 temporary Strength.

DeusExMachina.NAME: Deus Ex Machina
DeusExMachina.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, add !M! *Miracles to your hand and Exhaust.

Torrent.NAME: DEPRECATED Torrent
Torrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Shield.NAME: DEPRECATED Shield
Shield.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

CrescentKick.NAME: DEPRECATED Crescent Kick
CrescentKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Vigor, NL gain [W] and NL draw 1 card.

TalkToTheHand.NAME: Talk to the Hand
TalkToTheHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

BattleHymn.NAME: Battle Hymn
BattleHymn.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Smite into your hand.
BattleHymn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add a *Smite into your hand.

ClearTheMind.NAME: Tranquility
ClearTheMind.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Calm. NL Exhaust.

WaveOfTheHand.NAME: Wave of the Hand
WaveOfTheHand.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block this turn, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

SpiritShield.NAME: Spirit Shield
SpiritShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card in your hand.

Serenity.NAME: DEPRECATED Serenity
Serenity.DESCRIPTION: While you are in Calm, HP loss is reduced by !M!.

Crescendo.NAME: Crescendo
Crescendo.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Wrath. NL Exhaust.

Transcendence.NAME: Transcendence
Transcendence.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards that Retain in your hand.

FollowUp.NAME: Follow-Up
FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, gain [W].

Perseverance.NAME: Perseverance
Perseverance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Retained, increase its Block by !M! this combat.

CrushJoints.NAME: Crush Joints
CrushJoints.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was a Skill, apply !M! Vulnerable.

SashWhip.NAME: Sash Whip
SashWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, apply !M! Weak.

Sanctity.NAME: Sanctity
Sanctity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played this combat was a Skill, draw !M! cards.

Omniscience.NAME: Omniscience

Scrawl.NAME: Scrawl
Scrawl.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.

Swivel.NAME: Swivel
Swivel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next Attack you play costs 0.

MasterReality.NAME: Master Reality
MasterReality.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

BowlingBash.NAME: Bowling Bash
BowlingBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each enemy in combat.

Unraveling.NAME: Unraveling
Unraveling.DESCRIPTION: Play all of your cards from left to right. Targets are chosen randomly. NL Exhaust.

BigBrain.NAME: DEPRECATED Big Brain
BigBrain.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

SandsOfTime.NAME: Sands of Time
SandsOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

Brilliance.NAME: Brilliance
Brilliance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to Mantra gained this combat.

Retribution.NAME: DEPRECATED Retribution
Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, gain !M! Vigor.

JustLucky.NAME: Just Lucky
JustLucky.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

Weave.NAME: Weave
Weave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

Adaptation.NAME: Rushdown
Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw !M! cards.

Causality.NAME: Causality
Causality.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.
Causality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.

Wish.NAME: Wish
Wish.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain !B! Plated Armor, !D! Strength, or !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

CurseOfTheBell.NAME: Curse of the Bell
CurseOfTheBell.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cannot be removed from your deck.

InnerPeace.NAME: Inner Peace
InnerPeace.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Calm, draw !M! cards, otherwise enter Calm.

Tantrum.NAME: Tantrum
Tantrum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL !M! times. NL Enter Wrath. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

Alpha.NAME: Alpha
Alpha.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Beta into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Alpha.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a *Beta into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Beta.NAME: Beta
Beta.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Omega into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Omega.NAME: Omega
Omega.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Vengeance.NAME: Simmering Fury
Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw !M! cards.

PathToVictory.NAME: Pressure Points
PathToVictory.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.

Wallop.NAME: Wallop
Wallop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

Halt.NAME: Halt
Halt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are in Wrath, gain !M! additional Block.

Indignation.NAME: Indignation
Indignation.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Wrath, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies, otherwise enter Wrath.

ConjureBlade.NAME: Conjure Blade
ConjureBlade.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Expunger into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
ConjureBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Expunger with X+1 into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Discipline.NAME: DEPRECATED Discipline
Discipline.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with unused [W] , draw that many additional cards next turn.

Flick.NAME: DEPRECATED Flick
Flick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If an enemy is *Flicked 3 times, they take !M! damage.

LikeWater.NAME: Like Water
